title: Navigating Tech Careers in the Age of AI
location: Conestoga College, Waterloo Campus, Room: TBD
description: Join us for an insightful session with Subodh Kumar (Author, Harvard Business School alumnus) and Anish (CCS President). Learn practical strategies to stand out as a developer as AI becomes a teammate.
